channel.title: RFD Minigame help

item.title: RFD Minigame help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tank nation, post:10, topic:553870”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=672791.msg4499161#msg4499161 date=1447908855]
You will need to read Java tutorials, not RSPS.
RSPS tutorials don’t exactly go about doing things the best ways… As you already have noticed.
Here’s some links to java tutorials and documentation:
Java Tutorials by Oracle
Every tutorial by Oracle
Java API documentation

More can be found by googling “Java tutorials”
[/quote]

Is all of these very important or just certain ones?[/quote]
Well, 2 of them are the same thing. The first is a series of tutorials, from start to finish, but it’s at the first section of the tutorials. The second is those same tutorials, but ALL the tutorials that Oracle has provided for Java in one big list. The third link is Oracle’s documentation on the Java language.

All the data in the links I provided, is by Oracle, if you don’t know who the company Oracle is, they’re the current owners of Java. So yes, those are important in a sense.

Read full topic

item.title: RFD Minigame help
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:553870”]Not gonna lie, you should just rewrite the entire RFD system… You’re using way too many variables to control it in the first place… Which is why things aren’t working how you want.

You should avoid repeating yourself where possible.

Here’s a cleaned up version of your enterRFD() method… All I did was remove all the stuff that was repeated in each if statement.

[code=java]public void resetRFD() {
c.waveId = -1;
c.RFDToKill = -1;
c.RFDKilled = -1;
c.getPA().movePlayer(3203, 3424, 0);
}

public void enterRFD() {
if (c.Culin == true) {
c.sendMessage(“You have already finished this minigame!”);
return;
}
if (c.Agrith == false) {
c.waveId = 0;
c.RFDToKill = -1;
c.RFDKilled = -1;
}
if (c.Agrith == true && c.Flambeed == false) {
c.waveId = 1;
}
if (c.Flambeed == true && c.Karamel == false) {
c.waveId = 2;
}
if (c.Karamel == true && c.Dessourt == false) {
c.waveId = 3;
}
if (c.Dessourt == true && c.Culin == false) {
c.waveId = 4;
}
Server.rfd.spawnNextWave©;
c.getPA().movePlayer(1899, 5363, c.playerId * 4 + 2);
}[/code]

As for your actual issue…
We would need to see all code related to your minigame.[/quote]

Thanks to both of you for the help but i did figure this out, there was a coding missing from what i needed when i clicked on npc to make dialogue action work.

if (c.dialogueAction == 101) { c.getPA().enterRFD(); c.sendMessage("GOOD LUCK!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: RFD Minigame help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Not gonna lie, you should just rewrite the entire RFD system… You’re using way too many variables to control it in the first place… Which is why things aren’t working how you want.

You should avoid repeating yourself where possible.

Here’s a cleaned up version of your enterRFD() method… All I did was remove all the stuff that was repeated in each if statement.

[code=java]public void resetRFD() {
c.waveId = -1;
c.RFDToKill = -1;
c.RFDKilled = -1;
c.getPA().movePlayer(3203, 3424, 0);
}

public void enterRFD() {
if (c.Culin == true) {
c.sendMessage(“You have already finished this minigame!”);
return;
}
if (c.Agrith == false) {
c.waveId = 0;
c.RFDToKill = -1;
c.RFDKilled = -1;
}
if (c.Agrith == true && c.Flambeed == false) {
c.waveId = 1;
}
if (c.Flambeed == true && c.Karamel == false) {
c.waveId = 2;
}
if (c.Karamel == true && c.Dessourt == false) {
c.waveId = 3;
}
if (c.Dessourt == true && c.Culin == false) {
c.waveId = 4;
}
Server.rfd.spawnNextWave©;
c.getPA().movePlayer(1899, 5363, c.playerId * 4 + 2);
}[/code]

As for your actual issue…
We would need to see all code related to your minigame.

Read full topic

item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“Soulxs, post:2, topic:553870”]I think what you need to do (then again i’m pretty bad at developing so this is just what i would try) is:

[code=java]public void resetRFD() {
c.waveId = -1;
c.RFDToKill = -1;
c.RFDKilled = -1;
c.getPA().movePlayer(3203,3424,0);
}

    public void enterRFD() {
                    if (c.Culin == true) {
                    c.sendMessage("You have already finished this minigame!");
                    return;
                    } else {

Server.rfd.spawnNextWave©; // ------------ You might need to declare what waveId it is since i have no idea
}
if (c.Agrith == true && c.Flambeed == false) {
c.waveId = 1;
c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
Server.rfd.spawnNextWave©;
return;
}
if(c.Flambeed == true && c.Karamel == false) {
c.waveId = 2;
c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
Server.rfd.spawnNextWave©;
return;
}
if(c.Karamel == true && c.Dessourt == false) {
c.waveId = 3;
c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
Server.rfd.spawnNextWave©;
return;
}
if(c.Dessourt == true && c.Culin == false) {
c.waveId = 4;
c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
Server.rfd.spawnNextWave©;
return;
}
if (c.Agrith == false) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
c.waveId = 0;
c.RFDToKill = -1;
c.RFDKilled = -1;
Server.rfd.spawnNextWave©;
}
}[/code][/quote]

Thanks for the try. It didn’t work unfortunately wish it did, if you wanna give it another go at helping me that’s cool but i’m gonna look into some of the same problems and see if I can find it.

item.title: RFD Minigame help
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Ok so I followed a guide and i was fixing the errors and things like that got it to compile nicely and i fixed the dialogues ect… so that it would come up now i’m just having a problem with the teleporting and getting the Minigame to actually start. Basically what I did was went into clickingbuttons and made the dialogue teleport me to the exact spot as needed. Again just need the minigame to start now.

Playerassistance.java

[code]public void resetRFD() {
c.waveId = -1;
c.RFDToKill = -1;
c.RFDKilled = -1;
c.getPA().movePlayer(3203,3424,0);
}

    public void enterRFD() {
                    if (c.Culin == true) {
                    c.sendMessage("You have already finished this minigame!");
                    return;
                    }
                    if (c.Agrith == true && c.Flambeed == false) {
                    c.waveId = 1;
                    c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
            Server.rfd.spawnNextWave(c);
            return;
                    } 
            if(c.Flambeed == true && c.Karamel == false) {
                    c.waveId = 2;
                    c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
            Server.rfd.spawnNextWave(c);
            return;
                    } 
            if(c.Karamel == true && c.Dessourt == false) {
                    c.waveId = 3;
                    c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
            Server.rfd.spawnNextWave(c);
            return;
                    } 
            if(c.Dessourt == true && c.Culin == false) {
                    c.waveId = 4;
                    c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
            Server.rfd.spawnNextWave(c);
                    return;
                    } 
                    if (c.Agrith == false) {
                    c.getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, c.playerId * 4+2);
            c.waveId = 0;
            c.RFDToKill = -1;
            c.RFDKilled = -1;
            Server.rfd.spawnNextWave(c);
    }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
